definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
chest and hypochondrium/upper part of the body
(TCM) plum-pit qi, a feeling of a lump in the throat (globus pharyngis) or of stagnant phlegm
shaking in fear/one's heart palpitating with fear
nine orifices of the human body (eyes, nostrils, ears, mouth, urethra, anus)
interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
